MarketingLink.name: MarketingLink
MarketingLink.description: Represents an Account Engagement marketing link record, either a custom redirect or a file, that has been synced to Salesforce.

CampaignId.description: The ID of the related campaign.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp that indicates when the current user last viewed a record that is related to this marketing link.

LastViewedDate.description: The date and time when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (see LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of the marketing link.

TargetUrl.description: The target URL of the marketing link.

TotalTrackedLinkClicks.description: The total number of clicks for the redirect. Includes clicks from visitors and identified prospects. When a person clicks the link multiple times, each click is counted in this number.

Type.description: Specifies the type of marketing link record, either a custom redirect or file.

UniqueTrackedLinkClicks.description: The number of unique clicks for the redirect. Includes clicks from visitors and identified prospects. Only the first click is counted in this number.
